00073 int update_device_codes( std::string pci_ids_file )
00074 {
00075   PciIdsDevice* last_device;
00076 
00077   std::string hex_chars = "0123456789abcdef";       // String of hexadecimal chars to check.
00078   
00079   const int LSIZE = 200;
00080   char read_linec[LSIZE];                           // Hold the line read as an array of char.
00081   std::string analyze_line;                         // Hold the line read as string.
00082   
00083   int position = 0;
00084   
00085   std::ifstream pci_ids(pci_ids_file.c_str());          // Open the 'pci.ids' file for reading.
00086   if(!pci_ids){
00087     wApp->log("debug") << "Could not open pci.ids!!!";
00088     return 1;
00089   }
00090   
00091   while( !pci_ids.eof() ){                              // Read continuously
00092     pci_ids.getline(read_linec, LSIZE);
00093 
00094     if( strcspn(read_linec, hex_chars.c_str() ) != 0 )  // if first char of line is not an HEX, continue
00095       continue;
00096     else{                                               // else if we match an HEX at first char,
00097       position = pci_ids.tellg() - strlen(read_linec) - 1; // get the position of first match.
00098       break;
00099     }
00100   }
00101   // @TODO: What-if there is no line beginning with Hex chars, put exception..
00102 
00103   
00104   pci_ids.seekg(position);              // Seek back to the first HEX match, cause pointer is at next line.
00105 
00106   
00107 
00108   while ( !pci_ids.eof() ){                 // Read continuously
00109     pci_ids.getline( read_linec, LSIZE );
00110     analyze_line = read_linec;
00111 
00112     // If line is not empty and first character is an HEX
00113     if ( !analyze_line.empty() && ( hex_chars.find(analyze_line.at(0)) != std::string::npos ) ) {
00114       
00115       add_vendor(analyze_line);             // Then this is a vendor, so add it.
00116 
00117       while(1){                             // loop for the Devices and Subsys' of last read Vendor.
00118         pci_ids.getline( read_linec, LSIZE );
00119         analyze_line = read_linec;
00120 
00121         // if there is an empty or comment line, skip it..
00122         if ( analyze_line.empty() || analyze_line.at(0) == '#' )
00123           continue;
00124         
00125         // So if the line is NOT empty, and first character is a TAB, then either a Device or Subsystem.
00126         if ( !analyze_line.empty() && analyze_line.at(0) == '\t' ){
00127           
00128           if ( analyze_line.at(1) != '\t' ){                        // So this is a Device entry line.
00129             
00130             PciIdsVendor& list_last = vendor_list.back();           // Get the last read Vendor.
00131 
00132             // Add device providing it's vendor, and retrieve a pointer to it.
00133             last_device = add_device( analyze_line, &list_last );
00134             
00135           }
00136           else if ( analyze_line.at(1) == '\t' ){                   // There are 2 TABs, so a Subsystem entry.
00137             
00138             // Add subsystem providing it's device.
00139             add_subsys(analyze_line, last_device);
00140             
00141           }
00142           else  // end-of-file
00143             break;
00144           
00145         }
00146         else    // Vendor line, empty line or end-of-file
00147           break;
00148         
00149       } // end-of-while(1)
00150 
00151       // Last read line is not a device or subsystem line, so rewind it to see if it's a Vendor line.
00152       position = pci_ids.tellg() - strlen(read_linec) - 1;
00153       pci_ids.seekg(position);
00154       
00155     }
00156   } // end-of while ( !pci_ids.eof() )
00157 
00158 
00159   if ( store_pci_all() != 0 ){  // Store PCI Device Codes in the database
00160     delete_pci_all();
00161     return 1;                   // return 1 if we fail..
00162   }
00163 
00164 
00165   delete_pci_all();             // Iterate in vendor_list and delete all objects
00166 
00167   return 0;
00168 }

00179 void add_vendor (std::string analyze)
00180 {
00181   std::string vendor_code, vendor_name;
00182   std::string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00183   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ");
00184   vendor_code = analyze.substr( 0, end_pos );       // Substract the Vendor Code from line.
00185 
00186   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00187   vendor_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);            // Substract the Vendor Name from line.
00188 
00189   
00190   PciIdsVendor* new_vendor = new PciIdsVendor(vendor_code, vendor_name);
00191   vendor_list.push_back(*new_vendor);               // Add a copy of the Vendor instace to vendor_list.
00192   delete new_vendor;
00193 }

00207 PciIdsDevice* add_device (std::string analyze, PciIdsVendor* parent_vendor)
00208 {
00209   std::string dev_code, dev_name;
00210   std::string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00211   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of('\t');
00212   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00213   dev_code = analyze.substr( beg_pos, end_pos-beg_pos );    // Substract the Device Code from line.
00214 
00215   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00216   dev_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);                       // Substract the Device Name from line.
00217 
00218   // Create a Pci IDs Device object providing a pointer to it's Vendor object.
00219   PciIdsDevice* new_device = new PciIdsDevice(parent_vendor, dev_code, dev_name);
00220   return new_device;            // The created Pci IDs Device object.
00221 }

00233 void add_subsys (std::string analyze, PciIdsDevice* parent_device)
00234 {
00235   std::string subsys_vdr, subsys_dev, subsys_name;
00236   std::string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00237   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of('\t');
00238   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00239   subsys_vdr = analyze.substr( beg_pos, end_pos-beg_pos );  // Substract the Subvendor Code from line.
00240 
00241   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00242   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00243   subsys_dev = analyze.substr( beg_pos, end_pos-beg_pos );  // Substract the Subdevice Code from line.
00244 
00245   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ", end_pos);
00246   subsys_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);                    // Substract the Subsystem Name from line.
00247   
00248   // Create a Pci IDs Subsystem object providing a pointer to it's Device object.
00249   PciIdsSubsys* new_subsys = new PciIdsSubsys(parent_device, subsys_vdr, subsys_dev, subsys_name);
00250 }

00262 void delete_pci_all(void)
00263 {
00264   int vendor_list_size = vendor_list.size();
00265   
00266   for( int j=0; j<vendor_list_size; j++ ){
00267     vendor_list.pop_front();                    // STL pop calls the destructor of the current PciIdsVendor object
00268   }
00269 
00270 }

00285 int store_pci_all(void)
00286 {
00287   std::list<PciIdsVendor>::iterator iter;
00288 
00289   for( iter = vendor_list.begin(); iter != vendor_list.end(); ++iter ){
00290     if ( iter->store_db() != 0 ) // Store Vendor together with it's Devices and Subsystems of the Devices.
00291       return 1;
00292   }
00293   return 0;
00294 
00295 }

00313 int update_class_codes( std::string pci_ids_file )
00314 {
00315   PciIdsSubclass* last_subclass;
00316   
00317   const int LSIZE = 200;
00318   char read_linec[LSIZE];                       // Hold the line read as an array of char.
00319   string analyze_line;                          // Hold the line read as string.
00320 
00321   int position = 0;
00322 
00323   ifstream class_ids(pci_ids_file.c_str());     // Open the 'pci.ids' file for reading.
00324   if(!class_ids){
00325     wApp->log("debug") << "Could not open pci.ids!!!";
00326     return 1;
00327   }
00328 
00329   while( !class_ids.eof() ){                    // Read continuously
00330     class_ids.getline(read_linec, LSIZE);
00331     
00332     // @TODO: regexp might be used with C++ TR1
00333     if( read_linec[0] != 'C' )                  // if first char of line is not 'C', continue
00334       continue;
00335     else{                                       // else if we match a 'C' at first char,
00336       position = class_ids.tellg() - strlen(read_linec) - 1; // get the position of first match.
00337       break;
00338     }
00339   }
00340   // @TODO: What-if there is no line beginning with "C", put exception..
00341 
00342   
00343   class_ids.seekg(position);    // Seek back to the first 'C' match, cause pointer is at next line.
00344 
00345   
00346 
00347   while ( !class_ids.eof() ){               // Read continuously
00348     class_ids.getline( read_linec, LSIZE );
00349     analyze_line = read_linec;
00350 
00351     // If line is not empty and first character is a 'C'        
00352     if ( !analyze_line.empty() && analyze_line.at(0) == 'C'){
00353       
00354       add_class(analyze_line);              // Then this is a Class, so add it.
00355 
00356       do{                                   // loop for the Subclasses and Progifs of last read Class.
00357         class_ids.getline( read_linec, LSIZE );
00358         analyze_line = read_linec;
00359 
00361 
00362         // So if the line is NOT empty, and first character is a TAB, then either Subclass or Prog-if.      
00363         if ( !analyze_line.empty() && analyze_line.at(0) == '\t' ){
00364           
00365           if ( analyze_line.at(1) != '\t' ){                // So this is a Subclass entry line.
00366 
00367             // Add Subclass providing it's Class, and retrieve a pointer to it.
00368             last_subclass = add_subclass(analyze_line, &(class_list.back()));
00369             
00370           }
00371           else if ( analyze_line.at(1) == '\t' ){           // There are 2 TABs, so a Prog-if entry.
00372 
00373             // Add Prog-if providing it's Subclass.
00374             add_progif(analyze_line, last_subclass);
00375             
00376           }
00377           else  // end-of-file
00378             break;
00379         }
00380         else    // Class line, empty line or end-of-file
00381           break;
00382         
00383       } while( analyze_line.at(0) !=  'C' );
00384 
00385       // Last read line is not a Subclass or Prog-if line, so rewind it to see if it's a Class line.      
00386       position = class_ids.tellg() - strlen(read_linec) - 1;
00387       class_ids.seekg(position);
00388       
00389     }
00390   } // end-of while ( !pci_ids.eof() )
00391 
00392   
00393 
00394   if( store_classes() != 0 ){   // Store PCI Class Codes in the database
00395     delete_classes();
00396     return 1;                   // return 1 if we fail..
00397   }
00398 
00399 
00400   delete_classes();             // Iterate in class_list and delete all objects
00401 
00402   return 0;
00403 }

00414 void add_class (string analyze)
00415 {
00416   string class_code, class_name;
00417   string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00418   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ");
00419   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00420   class_code = analyze.substr( beg_pos+1 , end_pos-beg_pos-1 ); // Substract the Class Code from line.
00421 
00422   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00423   class_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);                         // Substract the Class Name from line.
00424 
00425   PciIdsClass* new_class = new PciIdsClass(class_code, class_name);
00426   class_list.push_back(*new_class);                 // Add a copy of the Vendor instace to vendor_list.
00427   delete new_class;
00428 }

00442 PciIdsSubclass* add_subclass (string analyze, PciIdsClass* parent_class)
00443 {
00444   string sub_code, sub_name;
00445   string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00446   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of('\t');
00447   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00448   sub_code = analyze.substr( beg_pos, end_pos-beg_pos );    // Substract the Subclass Code from line.
00449 
00450   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00451   sub_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);                       // Substract the Subclass Name from line.
00452 
00453   // Create a Pci IDs Subclass object providing a pointer to it's Class object.
00454   PciIdsSubclass* new_subclass = new PciIdsSubclass(parent_class, sub_code, sub_name);
00455   return new_subclass;          // The created Pci IDs Subclass object.
00456 }

00468 void add_progif (string analyze, PciIdsSubclass* parent_subclass)
00469 {
00470   string prog_code, prog_name;
00471   string::size_type beg_pos, end_pos;
00472   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of('\t');
00473   end_pos = analyze.find_first_of(" ", beg_pos+1);
00474   prog_code = analyze.substr( beg_pos, end_pos-beg_pos );   // Substract the Prog-if Code from line.
00475 
00476   beg_pos = analyze.find_first_not_of(" ",end_pos);
00477   prog_name = analyze.substr(beg_pos);                      // Substract the Prog-if Name from line.
00478 
00479   // Create a Pci IDs Prog-if object providing a pointer to it's Subclass object.
00480   PciIdsProgif* new_progif = new PciIdsProgif(parent_subclass, prog_code, prog_name);

00496 int store_classes(void)
00497 {
00498   list<PciIdsClass>::iterator iter;
00499 
00500   for( iter = class_list.begin(); iter != class_list.end(); ++iter ){
00501     if( iter->store_db() != 0 ) // Store Class together with it's Subclasses and Prog-ifs of the Subclasses.
00502       return 1;
00503   }
00504 
00505   return 0;
00506 }

00518 void delete_classes(void)
00519 {
00520   int class_list_size = class_list.size();
00521   
00522   for( int j=0; j<class_list_size; j++ ){
00523     class_list.pop_front();     // STL pop calls the destructor of the current PciIdsClass object
00524   }
00525 
00526 }

00530 
00538 int update_pci_ids( std::string pci_ids_file )
00539 {
00540   if ( update_device_codes( pci_ids_file ) != 0 )   // Manage update of PCI Device codes.
00541     return 1;
00542 
00543   if ( update_class_codes( pci_ids_file ) != 0 )    // Manage update of PCI Class codes.
00544     return 1;
00545 
00546   return 0;
00547 }
